body.name: Hugolog 2K 3MP Indoor Pan/Tilt Security Camera with 12×Zoom,Ideal for Baby Monitor/Pet Camera/Home Security,Starlight Color Night Vision,Human/Sound Detection,Two-Way Audio,US Cloud,Works with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 22 mins
features: [Smart Motion Tracking & Auto-Focus and Zoom] With advanced AI-powered tracking, the Hugolog black indoor camera can follow your family members or pets around the room, automatically adjusting its focus to zoom in up to 3X to capture critical details to ensure that crucial information is recorded in high definition and automatically saves the videos for easy review cherished memories at a later time.

[2K Hd And Starlight Color Night Vision] 3MP 2K resolution 24/7 recording security camera outdoor brings ultra-clear view and detailed real-time moment, recordings, or live footage all the time. Built-in powerful starlight sensor can provide a full-color night view, 40X darker than traditional video cameras. The new F/1.4 aperture captures 2.5X more light, Enabling you with a high-quality view even at night.

[Smart Motion and Sound Detection & Instant Notification] The security cameras built-in advanced Ai human and pet detection, which can reduce false alerts. As soon as motion, human presence, or a crying baby is detected the camera will start recording and push a notification in case you want to see what is happening.

[Two-Way Audio & Alarm Siren]Wifi security camera enables you talk with you family or visitors on your mobile phone. You can set an audible alarm to sound a loud alarm when a moving object is detected，then built-in advanced microphone speaker allows you scare away uninvited guests, and say hello to welcome guests.

[U.S. Cloud Storage & Micro SD Card Storage]The indoor security cameras support cloud storage and a built-in micro-sd slot. The server is located in the US. Recording to the encrypted cloud server helps to avoid the risk of losing video clips, and ensure all your videos are safe and protected. The home security support micro sd card up to 128Gb, To store high quality 2K day and night color footage locally in the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality picture and camera!
reviews.reviewText: First, this thing actually seems good quality. Even the packing job and material seemed good. The motors work smoothly and quietly, and parts fit together well. This is not always the case at these price points.- Great HD video quality (turn on the Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) in the app)- Complete 360 rotation, AND great up and down tilt.- Appreciate the extra long USB-A to USB-C power cable.- The charging rectangle is the smallest I've seen that puts out 1A.- Night vision comes with IR lights (took a picture to see, they're only on when it's in night vision mode)- Motion tracking is super cool! And surprisingly accurate.Almost all of the interfacing with this camera will happen through the app. And it seems like it's a pretty standard smart device type app, like "Smart Life", which should be good for reliability. I actually tried the Smart Life app and it almost connected, but ultimately didn't work. Using their app was simple enough and I could do pretty much everything I wanted to do without reading any instructions. lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and peace of mind for your home security! Highly recommended.
reviews.reviewText: This indoor security camera w/Wi-Fi connection is well designed with multiple features operated by your smartphone. It is easy setup, wide angles (360-degree) capturing, up to 3x zoom, motion detection, sound detection, night vision and so on. Captured records can be saved into a SD card and/or cloud (subscription required). It can be set on a table and mounted at any place w/mounting sets included. The quality and resolution of this camera is very satisfied and the power of wide-range capturing feature can fully replace a multiple camera system in a small single house.Only one thing is the 360-degree rotation is limited to one-way direction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice camera
reviews.reviewText: I just bought the Hugolog R6P 3K HD Security Camera. It was very easy to setup and use. Installation was clear and it was running very quickly I like the image quality and even in low light the images are very impressive. I tested the motion tracking also and it seems to track very well.Overall the build quality and the packaging are very professional. The base weighs enough to not slip or move or get knocked over. I like the long cable and the connection. Very well done and the price paid is quite reasonable considering all that you are getting with this camera. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Indoor Camera!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera after reading many positive opinions and comparing different models. I was impressed by the quality and performance of this camera, The picture quality is in definitely high definition and a night vision mode is good too. The camera is easy to install and use on wall, ceilings, or flat surfaces. It comes with everything you need, including screws, dowels, a drilling template, a USB cable, and a power adapter. The camera works with the hugolog Cloud app, which is available for both Android and Apple. The app lets you control the camera settings, such as motion detection, alarm, resolution, and position. The camera supports a micro SD card up to 128 GB (which you need to buy separately or cloud storage. I had a memory card, so it didn't use the cloud option. The camera has a compact size and a beautiful design, and the packaging is simple and functional. The app has a detailed video with subtitles on how to install it, making installing straightforward. You just need 2.4G for Wifi (not 5G), which is not an issue. I am very satisfied with this purchase, and I recommend this camera to anyone looking for a good indoor surveillance camera at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera
reviews.reviewText: Great little camera. It comes with mounting screws or a base. You can move the camera from the app on your phone. Picture quality is solid. Features like night vision, motion detection, etc.Setup was very easy: Scan QR to download the app. Make an account. Plug it in, push the button, and pair it. Done in under 2 minutes.Limited free storage, affordable plans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera works just as advertised. Simple to use and easy to set up. The packaging is good with the camera well secured.We use it as a security camera. The picture quality is excellent! The tracking of people moving around is excellent. It will swivel side-to-side and up or down. The microphone works well. You can hear a conversation if it is within a few feet of the camera. The speaker on the camera sounds tinny but is understandable.The iPhone app is simple to set up and well-designed. The booklet that comes with the camera is good and written in proper English!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent camera, better than cameras 3 times the cost
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Indoor Pan/Tilt Security Camera, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in every way. The installation process was incredibly easy, making it a hassle-free addition to my home security setup.One of the standout features of this camera is the extensive range of capabilities it offers without the need for a monthly subscription. This is a significant advantage, as it not only saves on costs but also provides access to a plethora of useful functionalities.The pan and tilt features are particularly impressive, allowing me to monitor a wide area with ease. The camera's flexibility in movement ensures that no corner is left unchecked, providing comprehensive coverage for enhanced security.The video quality is exceptional, delivering clear and crisp footage in various lighting conditions. I appreciate the attention to detail in the design, which includes night vision capabilities, ensuring round-the-clock surveillance.Setting up the camera was a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly interface and straightforward instructions provided. The mobile app is intuitive and allows for seamless control, enabling me to adjust settings and view live footage from anywhere with an internet connection.After experiencing the reliability and performance of this indoor security camera, I am already planning to purchase more for other areas of my home. It offers peace of mind and convenience without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewerName: Me falto la de flores blancas, me llegó una repetida.Me falto la de flores blancas, me llegó una repetida.
reviews.reviewText: Muy buena calidad de imagen, la app es muy fácil de usar. Lo recomiendo! 👏🏻
